ai.question: Which section of the network proposal appears in the beginning and covers benefits to the customer and summarizes the prioritized goals and project scope?

choice.text: network requirements and current network environment

ai.question: What are two benefits with a green field installation? (Choose two.)

choice.text: a green field or new installation is cheaper then other implementation methods
there are no users or services to disrupt
a phased approach makes implemention quicker
all of the equipment and services can be installed at the same time
outdated equipment can be replaced with newer equipment

ai.question: Which two are benefits to purchasing a Cisco SMARTnet contract? (Choose two.)

choice.text: Access to Cisco TAC 24 hours a day 7 days a week.
Free equipment based on the contract coverage.
Free shipping to customers that adhere to the Cisco SMARTnet contracts.

ai.question: Which section of the network proposal contains escalations and complaint resolutions?
When can the implementation phase of a network project begin?

choice.text: on the date that was set in the network proposal
as soon as the network design is completed
as soon as the customer approves the implementation plan
as soon as the planning phase has ended

ai.question: Which three types of documentation are required for each task in the implementation plan of the network proposal? (Choose three.)

choice.text: rollback guidelines in case of failure
estimated costs associated with new hardware
training requirements for the end users

ai.question: A company has requested the IT department to upgrade the backbone of their network to increase throughput and productivity. Management has requested that the services remain stable and usable during this upgrade. In addition, the management has decided to replace all of the existing backbone devices and has agreed to purchase all new devices and cabling. Which installation method is best for this company?
